bad_metric = 42
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    GriSPy(self.data, N_cells=self.N_cells, periodic=self.periodic, metric=
        bad_metric, copy_data=self.copy_data)
bad_metric = 'euclidean'
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    GriSPy(self.data, N_cells=self.N_cells, periodic=self.periodic, metric=
        bad_metric, copy_data=self.copy_data)
